name: Imagine Sweet 16
description:
You're about to turn 16, and you’ve just joined a new high school. How
will you become THE girl to know? By planning, promoting and hosting the
most awesome Sweet Sixteen parties ever – including your own! Invite all
your friends, choose fun activities, and keep the party going all night
long!

Features

• Get Creative: Plan parties with any theme you want!a
- Select
the decorations and interior design
- Choose coordinating activities
to entertain your guests
- Pick the right music to keep the party
going all night long
• Have Fun: Pay attention to your guests’ moods
and make sure everyone has a rockin’ good time to boost your score.
•
Social Networking on your DS: Build your virtual friends network and
boost your popularity by hosting parties for your classmates!
